title: When You're a Mid Top main and your friends suggest you should play ADC
body:
Then you remember what the meta is like right now...

https://i.imgflip.com/1hylqf.jpg

replies.body:
When you're a support main and you get mid/top

https://media.giphy.com/media/WIg8P0VNpgH8Q/giphy.gif

http://i.imgur.com/bofUVay.gif?noredirect
I actually laughed out loud
I LOVED this movie
Haha im glad! I loved this movie too! :D

Upvoted for the meme.

People use it so many times, but it's still hilarious.

I played mid for the first time in a year since my friend wanted support. It was like... not to be mean to those who play mid lane, but that shit was the most relaxing thing I've played in months. It was 1v1 all game, and sometimes I'd be ganked and I'd only have to move a few steps away and be fine. In the bot lane it's 4 people at 5 minutes and after a gank the jungler will stay to siege. 

Hell, I was the one going bot for free kills. Felt so good. I'm now a mid main.

Yeah once i played mid I was hooked for life. I love the 1v1 duel and when everyone comes botlane it ruins that experience for me whenever I play adc. 

Also +1 for your name!

Even if the jungler ganks you might have a chance to turn it around and kill the jungler while escaping.

Especially those trigger happy lee sins who follow up on their q's while you're within flash distance of your tower so you can cc them and let the tower do all the work :D.

2k17 ADD, friends want you to go ADC.... friends... FRIENDS, **FRIENDS**
With friends like this you do not really need enemies
i always say rip adc when i get put there but i sure do have so much damn fun with my friends even though im adc and rip me
Yeah same haha. Playing with friends makes everything so much better

_(wishing they had friends like:)_
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Well i didn't vote for you
Russians rigged the coronation
Heya top lane main here.... tis true. i've been trying to get back into adc at the wrong time XD
I approve of this meme. *SeemsGood* We need more Monty Python memes.

THIS.

EXACTLY this.

Thank you!
If your support goes Ivern, you can just basically play a normal bruiser/juggernaut. With the advent of Ziggs botlane, you can play mid bot as well.
Yeah ive tried trolling in a yasuo ivern botlane. Its pretty funny :D

Did the other team enjoy it at all?

My guess is they hated it.

Unless you did poorly, that is?

tbh i go adc a few times and never have any problems sure there were times when i was getting dived by people 4 manning but i knew i had a late game to fall back on in mid lane most of the time its usually over for me since i play assassins mostly and top lane i never really understood top lane even tho ive been told its easier than mid
top lane is not easier then mid. You have to have a much better undeerstanding wave managment and trading.
i wish people in my elo would understand the relationship between late game wave management and rotating
yeah. true. but i was refering to early game wave management for toplane players.
"I can go bot, but I make no promises to play an ADC."

The main reason I can't play ADC is because I can't stutter step (I hate right clicking that much). Thats why I play casters (AD or AP, but mostly AP). I personally do not feel that ADCs are in that bad of a situation right now, late game ADC's are still able to do consistent burst damage to squishies believe it or not, and the reason why they need to get one shotted is that if they survive, they can life steal and kill you off. Bot lane was always a silly place to begin with though.
ever try attack move comand? you can replbind it to the "a" key and it will move your champ to the designated spot then attack whatever you were already attacking or the closest enemy
I like aa move only click to be honest. I would suggest trying that one also.
I main mid and secondary top. ADC is the one roll that I will never play.
